title: Lets do some trading! got lots to offer
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Lets do some trading! got lots to offer
posts.post_content:
I am looking for the following cards. please help as my wife wont let me buy anymore :(

Wanted: T202:
Evers/Evers/chance
Overall/Archer (either
Chance/Shean
Cobb/ Good play at third/Moriarty
Matty/Devlin (any)
Matty/Flecterh (any)

M116:
Evers black back
Tinker black back
any cubs graded over a 3

M101-4
Mordecai Brown
Doolan
Fischer
Flack
Lavender
Mann
Yerkes

autographed 1933 goudey

Hal Chase (anything but preferably colgan, Brunners, Caramel, etc)

autographed 1988 Starting lineup Baseball packages (any)

Besides what is shown below I also have the following for trades (scans available upon request)
Group of poor condition b18 blankets
m 101-4 Herpolsheimer Shano Collins GC auth
M101-4 Famous & Barr russell sgc 10
Heinie Manush signed diamond Star
Glen Myatt signed diamond star
autographed E120 Waite Hoyt (super nice)
T202 Collins/nurphy nice condition with just slighttear at top
Many more t202's just ask
